channel.title: Introduction on Algorithm
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Algorithm

item.description: class Solution { public int[] searchRange(int[] nums, int target) { if (nums == null || nums.length == 0) { return new int[]{-1, -1}; } int left = searchFirstLeft(nums, target); int right = searchLastRight(nums, target); return new int[]{left, right}; } private int searchFirstLeft(int[] nums, int target) { int i = 0, j = nums.length - 1, res = -1; while (i <= j) { int m = i + (j - i) / 2; if (nums[m] == target) { res = m; j = m - 1; } else if (nums[m] > target) { j = m - 1; } else { i = m + 1; } } return res; } private int searchLastRight(int[] nums, int target) { int i = 0, j = nums.

class Solution { public int search(int[] nums, int target) { int i = 0, j = nums.length - 1; if (target >= nums[0]) { while (i <= j) { int m = i + (j - i) / 2; if (nums[m] == target) { return m; } else if (nums[m] < target && nums[m] >= nums[0]) { i = m + 1; } else { j = m - 1; } } } else { while (i <= j) { int m = i + (j - i) / 2; if (nums[m] == target) { return m; } else if (nums[m] > target && nums[m] < nums[0]) { j = m - 1; } else { i = m + 1; } } } return -1; } } Time: O(logn) Space: O(1)

class Solution { public int search(int[] nums, int target) { int i = 0, j = nums.length - 1; while (i <= j) { int m = i + (j - i) / 2; // (j + i) / 2 migth cause integer out of bound if (nums[m] == target) { return m; } if (nums[m] < target) { i = m + 1; } else { j = m - 1; } } return -1; } } Time: O(logn) Space: O(1)
